name: Git Repository Exposure
description: Detects exposed .git directories and files that leak source code and credentials
cwe_name: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
remediation: CRITICAL: Git repository is exposed! This can leak source code, credentials, and sensitive information. Immediate actions required: 1) Remove .git directory from web-accessible locations, 2) Configure web server to deny access to .git directories, 3) For Apache: add 'RedirectMatch 404 /\.git' to .htaccess, 4) For Nginx: add 'location ~ /\.git { deny all; }' to server config, 5) Use proper deployment practices (deploy only necessary files)
